name: Protect Your PS4!!
description:
Left/RightArrowKey = Walk

UpArrowKey = Lift

DownArrowKey+Left/RightArrowkey=Put Down

Space=Jump

Space*2=Double Jump

X=Smash

This game is action-based(though a little bit cumbersome), and a little like

terraria. (music is lovely ! !)

Your goal is to protect your ps4 in your room within certain amount of time.

It's my first time to join LD, and I am not that familiar with Unity3D Engine, so

things became quite different from what I expected.

But anyway I am enjoying designing games, and have a really good time.

Besides, my appreciation to the other teammate " cyprinoid " for creating

artwork.

Because of inadequate planning ahead of time, collision detecting is a little

weird.

So if you are stuck somewhere, try jumping.

Sorry for bugs you encounter while playing.

Have a good time.

HIGHLY LOOK FORWARD TO ANY FEEDBACKS!!!
